articles.title: Sega teams up with Microsoft to develop games on cloud platform - Guardian
articles.description: Japanese entertainment company Sega announced Monday it had agreed to a strategic alliance with Xbox maker Microsoft to develop video games on the American giant's Azure cloud platform.
articles.content:
Japanese entertainment company Sega announced Monday it had agreed to a strategic alliance with Xbox maker Microsoft to develop video games on the American giant’s Azure cloud platform.
The partners… [+1129 chars]
